rules.rationale: ecga_adj (338 vars, Visit 1) contains Pduration, QRSduration, ecga10-ecga113 (waveform measurements). ecgb (189 vars, Visit 2) contains ECGB11-ECGB122. Both are pure ECG device output.
rules.description: 'ecga_adj: Visit 1. ECG, arrhythmias, atrioventricular (A-V) conduction defects, Cornell Voltage Criteria, heart rate, intraventricular conduction defect...'

rules.rationale: abda (10 vars) and abha (24 vars) are both described as 'Carotid Ultrasound Data'. Variables are ABDA3-ABDA10 and ABHA1-ABHA27. Note: abba/abbb (Ankle-Brachial Blood Pressure) and abpa (Post Ambulatory BP) are different procedures and are correctly excluded by this regex.
rules.description: 'Visit 1. Carotid Ultrasound Data of participants including adult 35-84 years old African Americans'

rules.rationale: echa (61 vars) = 'Echocardiographic Abnormalities', Visit 1. Variables ECHA13-ECHA41 are echocardiographic measurements. Single-procedure cardiac ultrasound data.
rules.description: 'Visit 1. Echocardiographic Abnormalities of participants including adult 35-84 years old African Americans'

rules.rationale: pula (46 vars) = 'Pulmonary Function Data'. Variables include FEV01PP, FVC01PP (FEV1 and FVC percent predicted), pula10-pula50 (spirometric measurements). Single spirometer procedure.
rules.description: 'Pulmonary Function Data of participants including adult 35-84 years old African Americans'

rules.rationale: mribv2 (49 vars, Visit 2) and mribv3 (50 vars, Visit 3) contain brain MRI measurements. 'mrib' = MRI Brain, 'v2'/'v3' = visit number. Variables MRIB2-MRIB35 are volumetric and structural brain measures.
